headline: One-on-one with Democratic US Senate candidate John Fetterman
author: Barbara Barr
sentences: The leading Democratic candidates in the U.S. Senate race in Pennsylvania stopped by the Farm Show Complex on Saturday for an agricultural luncheon, and News 8 spoke one-on-one with Lt. Gov.
Fetterman said he's not concerned about whether the president's low approval ratings will impact Democrats' efforts to flip the Senate seat, which is being vacated by Republican Pat Toomey.
